component.name: FireDragon
component.summary: Floorp fork build using custom branding & settings.

description.p: FireDragon is a browser based on the excellent Floorp browser. It was customized to have dr460nized-fitting aestetics as well as many opiniated settings by default. As this browser was originally a Librewolf fork, we are trying to integrate its best patches and tweaks in the new base. The most important features in addition of Floorps own ones can be found below.

ul.li: Searx & Whoogle search engines added, with the possibility to run locally
The default search engine is Garuda's Searx instance
Keeping settings in sync with Librewolfs changes
Firefox accounts are enabled using a custom self-hosted sync server (ffsync.garudalinux.org)

Faster webpages loading from:
Custom Firedragon settings
Inclusion of FastFox tweaks
Hidden Navigation buttons instead of being greyed out when they are inactive
Spoofing Chrome on Windows (through Floorp's User Agent switcher) when not using Fingerprinting
